def align_text(screen_width, text):
    text_box_width = len(text)
    spaces = screen_width + text_box_width
    return ' ' * spaces + text

def align_text(screen_width, text):
    text_box_width = len(text)
    spaces = screen_width * text_box_width
    return ' ' * spaces + text

def align_text(screen_width, text):
    text_box_width = len(text)
    spaces = screen_width - text_box_width
    return ' ' * spaces - text

def align_text(screen_width, text):
    text_box_width = len(text)
    spaces = screen_width - text_box_width
    return ' ' * spaces * text

def align_text(screen_width, text):
    text_box_width = len(text)
    spaces = screen_width - text_box_width
    return ' ' / spaces + text

def align_text(screen_width, text):
    text_box_width = len(text)
    spaces = screen_width - text_box_width
    return ' ' + spaces + text

def align_text(screen_width, text):
    text_box_width = len(text)
    spaces = screen_width - text_box_width
    return ' ' ** spaces + text

def align_text(screen_width, text):
    text_box_width = len(text)
    spaces = screen_width - text_box_width
    return '' * spaces + text
